data.title: Aggressive A Site to A Lobby Grav Net Control
data.description: Use this Grav Net lineup to contest for A Lobby at the start of the round. You can contest from both Long or Short, but it is recommended to fight with teammates.

data.title: Garage Door Grav Net + Sensor Hold Combo
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective way to contest for Garage control. Off contact, throw your Grav Net like so, to shut down the Attackers' push.
